### Conflicts
No conflicts as of last run.
Tested ACK on the query part\n\none question though before I merge: are the IPv4 and IPv6 ASNs in a single namespace? if not, asn_count logic should take this into account
Yes, they are in the same namespace (notice ip**v46**) only max_per_asn will be chosen, weather they're all v4 or v6 or a combination of v4+v6
